name: Deer Hunter 3 Gold
summary:
The legendary hunting tradition continues with Deer Hunter 3 Gold Edition! All the exciting action of Deer Hunter 3 is back with a series of enhanced features. Take along your new 7mm rifle and assortment of scopes as you embark on hunting expeditions through maps of Utah and Missouri. Then head out to one of the 3 new locations in Wisconsin, or use the map editor to recreate your own favorite hunting spots.

Next take your hunting buddies through multi-player gameplay and engage in cooperative hunts. Then experiance the feeling of being hunted as you play the deer while your on-line competitors hunt you down!

Wht all these features and more, Deer Hunter 3 Gold Edition is 3D hunting As Real As It Gets!
